Structs/MinAggregation.html.abstract: A single-value metrics aggregation that keeps track and returns the minimum

Structs/StatsAggregation.html.name: StatsAggregation
Structs/StatsAggregation.html.abstract: A multi-value metrics aggregation that computes stats over numeric values

Structs/MaxAggregation.html.name: MaxAggregation
Structs/MaxAggregation.html.abstract: A single-value metrics aggregation that keeps track and returns the maximum

Structs/AvgAggregation.html.name: AvgAggregation
Structs/AvgAggregation.html.abstract: A single-value metrics aggregation that computes the average of numeric values

Structs/GeoCentroidAggregation.html.abstract: A metric aggregation that computes the weighted centroid from all coordinate

Structs/GeoBoundsAggregation.html.name: GeoBoundsAggregation
Structs/GeoBoundsAggregation.html.abstract: A metric aggregation that computes the bounding box containing all geo_point values for a field.

Structs/TopHitsAggregation.html.name: TopHitsAggregation
Structs/TopHitsAggregation.html.abstract: A top_hits metric aggregator keeps track of the most relevant document being

Structs/CardinalityAggregation.html.abstract: A single-value metrics aggregation that calculates an approximate count of

Structs/ValueCountAggregation.html.abstract: A single-value metrics aggregation that counts the number of values that are

Structs/ExtendedStatsAggregation.html.name: ExtendedStatsAggregation
Structs/ExtendedStatsAggregation.html.abstract: A multi-value metrics aggregation that computes stats over numeric values

Structs/TermsAggregation.html.name: TermsAggregation
Structs/TermsAggregation.html.abstract: A multi-bucket value source based aggregation where buckets are dynamically built - one per unique value.

Structs/SearchContainer.html.name: SearchContainer
Structs/SearchContainer.html.abstract: This is the topmost container for specifying a query.

Structs/BoolQuery.html.name: BoolQuery
Structs/BoolQuery.html.abstract: A query that matches documents matching boolean combinations of other queries.

Structs/CommonTerms.html.name: CommonTerms
Structs/CommonTerms.html.abstract: The common terms query is a modern alternative to stopwords which improves the

Structs/Exists.html.name: Exists
Structs/Exists.html.abstract: Returns documents that have at least one non-null value in the original field.

Structs/Fuzzy.html.name: Fuzzy
Structs/Fuzzy.html.abstract: The fuzzy query uses similarity based on Levenshtein edit distance. The fuzzy

Structs/IDs.html.name: IDs
Structs/IDs.html.abstract: Filters documents that only have the provided ids.

Structs/Match.html.name: Match
Structs/Match.html.abstract: Match queries accept text/numerics/dates, analyzes them, and constructs a query.

Structs/MatchAll.html.name: MatchAll
Structs/MatchAll.html.abstract: The most simple query, which matches all documents, giving them all a score of 1.0

Structs/MatchNone.html.name: MatchNone
Structs/MatchNone.html.abstract: This is the inverse of the MatchAll query, which matches no documents.

Structs/MatchPhrase.html.name: MatchPhrase
Structs/MatchPhrase.html.abstract: The MatchPhrase query analyzes the text and creates a phrase query out of the analyzed text.

Structs/MatchPhrasePrefix.html.name: MatchPhrasePrefix
Structs/MatchPhrasePrefix.html.abstract: The MatchPhrasePrefix is the same as match_phrase, except that it allows for prefix matches on the last term in the text.

Structs/MultiMatch.html.name: MultiMatch
Structs/MultiMatch.html.abstract: The MultiMatch query builds on the MatchQuery to allow multi-field queries.

Structs/Prefix.html.name: Prefix
Structs/Prefix.html.abstract: Matches documents that have fields containing terms with a specified prefix

Structs/Query.html.name: Query
Structs/Query.html.abstract: A Query starts the query portion of a search to be executed (as opposed to an Aggregation).

Structs/Range.html.name: Range
Structs/Range.html.abstract: Matches documents with fields that have terms within a certain range. The type

Structs/Regexp.html.name: Regexp
Structs/Regexp.html.abstract: The regexp query allows you to use regular expression term queries. See

Structs/ScriptQuery.html.name: ScriptQuery
Structs/ScriptQuery.html.abstract: A query allowing to define scripts as queries. They are typically used in a filter context.

Structs/Term.html.name: Term
Structs/Term.html.abstract: The Term query finds documents that contain the exact term specified in the inverted index.

Structs/Terms.html.name: Terms
Structs/Terms.html.abstract: Filters documents that have fields that match any of the provided terms (not analyzed).

Structs/Wildcard.html.abstract: Matches documents that have fields matching a wildcard expression (not

Structs/GeoPolygon.html.abstract: A query allowing to define scripts as queries. They are typically used in a filter context.
